title: Big Building Block Set - 214 Pieces Toddler Educational Toy Classic Large Size Building Block Bricks - 13 Fun Shapes and Storage Bucket - Compatible with All Major Brands Bulk Bricks Set for 3+ Ages
features: [Large Size Blocks, Perfect for Little Hands] The 214pcs Big Bricks set is a great way to inspire creativity, help improve hand-eye coordination, and aid in mental development. Let your child enjoy playful moments while learning new things at the same time
[Compatible with All Major Brands] Kids can easily mix with other large building blocks, classic building bricks, and building baseplate to build gardens, houses, and castle. Amazing childhood
[Reusable Big Storage Bucket with Handle] Collect and store all your blocks conveniently in the 4.1lbs strong bucket to keep dirt and dust away

MEETS ALL EU TOY SAFETY REQUIREMENTS - Every plastic blocks has been tested to comply with all EU toy safety standards and are free of lead, cadmium, and phthalates that are safe and reliable for your kids to play with our building construction toys

[Bonus! Includes Building Ideas] The kit includes colorful building ideas guide in every box. This set can build 32+ different models with stickers. Suitable for ages 3-99. Perfect birthday or holiday gift for boys and girls
description: Product Description Enjoy Playing, Building and Creating burgkidz Building Blocks in Bucket is designed as a collection of 19 different shapes and 10 classic colors to build more than 14+ different figures. Building blocks is an intimate game partner for kids and an important teaching tool for educating children, they can create unlimited designs due to the structure and function of the blocks. Building bricks provide a vast world of imagination for children, and effectively promotes creative thinking for children, especially useful for teaching hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness, and improving motor skills. Parents and Kids can share precious moments together. burgkidz blocks are specially designed to be safe and easy for little hands, the bricks are easy to grasp, stack, sort, build, and put together, helping toddlers practice fine motor skills as playing. Tight Fit And Perfect Match The building blocks are compatible with all major brands. With our brick building block, kids can easily mix with their other building bricks to build different figures with the window, door and eye sticker, great fun for endless possibilities for creative architecture and vehicle games. Compatible with similar plastic big size building blocks. Improve Imagination and Problem-Solving Skills The building block set is a great way to grow your toddler creativity, help improve hand-eye coordination, aid in mental development, and develop problem-solving skills. Get the best of education and entertainment as they learn to build cars, trees, towers, skyscraper, house, cute animals or whatever they dream up. Safe and Reliable Large Building Blocks burgkidz assured that all our blocks are made with high-quality, non-toxic, durable plastic, which is safe and reliable for your kids to play with our building toys. The bricks are in classic bright colors for different shapes that kids will love so much, and large size that no worry about choking danger. Perfect for Little Hands Is your child addicted to computer or mobile? Why not think of a set of building blocks? burgkidz contributes to the physical and social development of toddlers, preschoolers, and older kids. We aim to inspire young minds to explore their world by building and construction, stimulating imagination, expanding cognitive development and inspiring creativity. Cultivate your child's intelligence and exercise their learning ability. Forget about TV, computer or mobile games. Strong Plastic Bucket for Easy Storage These durable bricks are sure to be your kid's favorites toys to play years of creative building! Compared with other brand building blocks, burgkidz building blocks set nicely packed in a beautiful bucket with a carrying handle, which will make the perfect gift for your son, daughter, grandson, or nephew for holidays, birthday, or any occasion. Perfect for 2 years old up kids children and toddlers. When the building game is over, your kids can easily collect and store all their toys or bricks in the bucket to prevent dust and dirt.
